column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday June 22 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Oliver Lewis Way:
column4: Oliver Lewis Way is shutdown in both directions between W Main St and W High St due to investigation of an earlier serious collision at Manchester St reportedly involving a motorcycle.

column3: Traffic Alert for Oliver Lewis Way:
column4: UPDATE 10:22 a.m. - The roadway is back open at this time.
